meanings.definition: A brief statement or account of the main points of something.
meanings.sent1: I wrote a summary of the story for my friend.
meanings.sent2: Can you give me a summary of the meeting?
meanings.sent3: The summary of the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a summary of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's summary was clear and easy to understand.

meanings.definition: A brief summary of a book or article.
meanings.sent1: The summary at the back of the book helped me decide to read it.
meanings.sent2: I always read the summary before starting a new article.
meanings.sent3: The summary of the cookbook made me hungry.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were a summary of his excitement.
meanings.sent5: The summary of the research paper was informative and well-written.
